entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa steady
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -38.9°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
